steps: Good afternoon and welcome to our hotel! How may I assist you today?
I apologize for any inconvenience

I apologize for the inconvenience caused

I sincerely apologize for this error
I completely understand your concern, Mr. Smith, and I apologize once again for the inconvenience caused

Please rest assured that we take this matter seriously, and I will personally ensure that we find a solution for you. We do have limited availability for non-smoking rooms at the moment, but I will make every effort to accommodate your request
Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Smith

Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Smith

Once again, I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Mr. Smith
Rest assured, we will make the necessary arrangements for a seamless transition to your new non-smoking room
